name: Slime Time (HashiraCam)
description:
A game made at APU by Camron Williams

In this game, you are a slime that is trying to find your way out of a strange place you've been placed in.  Travel the land you find yourself in and get to the exit in this 2D side scroller adventure. Be wary of liquids, enemies, and the unexpected sticky surface.

WASD for movement. Alt + 4 to force quit.
